description:
Capri length leggings with an athletic fit for paddling a boat or board. They have pockets and seamed details that let you cut the cuffs to length.

  • Polyester and Spandex face fabric is bonded to 0.5mm petroleum-free neoprene
  • Nylon and polyester lining feels nice against your skin
  • Eco-Stretch neoprene is limestone-based and designed for comfort and warmth
  • Side pockets keep your snacks handy
  • UPF 50+ protects you from UV rays
  • Flat lock stitched seams throughout
  • Horizontal seams with bartacked edges let you cut the leg to crop or knicker-length or adjust for shorter legs
name: Level Six Sombrio Capri Neoprene Pants - Women's
